channel.title: Need help with prayer
channel.description: Hey i am using trisidiax sourse and really need a fix for the prayer. atm the prayer wont go down when being used how do i fix this and where do i even look? and i also have another problem with prayer. when somone switches prayer book then logs out. when they log back in and try to use prayer they get a message saying "You are not on the right prayer book!!" how do i fix this and where srry fo my noobness

item.title: Need help with prayer
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Jig Dr Jig
item.description:
@Dr_Jig wrote:

haha i know but what exactly should i look for that actually makes the prayer go down?

Read full topic

item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:
